content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment, let us focus solely on discussing the rental price for now. As a landlord seeking the highest possible price, I'll propose an initial figure of 1200 Euros per month. Do let me know if that works for you or if you'd like to suggest a different amount.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the rental price information. However, I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment because my budget is significantly lower. I'm searching for an affordable option to suit my student lifestyle. I hope you can understand and consider revising your proposal accordingly.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your budget seems incompatible with the proposed price due to your student lifestyle requirements.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
